In addition, the typical patient with CLL may already have background risk factors for life-threatening COVID-19 that apply to the general population. Notably male gender, age >65 years, and medical conditions such as cardiovascular disease, diabetes, chronic respiratory disease, hypertension, other cancers, chronic kidney disease, and >2 underlying diseases are known risk factors of morbidity and mortality from COVID-19.
